original_text: Yet for love's sake I rather beseech thee, being such an one as Paul the aged, and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 도리어 사랑으로써 간구하노라 나이가 많은 나 바울은 지금 또 예수 그리스도를 위하여 갇힌 자 되어

sentences.original_text: being such an one as Paul the aged
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나이 많은 바울과 같은 자로서

sentences.original_text: and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ
